createSchema.versionTable: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tapp (appname VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL, appversion VARCHAR(8) NOT NULL UNIQUE)
createSchema.userTable: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tuser (uid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, firstname VARCHAR(25), lastname VARCHAR(25) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL UNIQUE)

users.addUser: INSERT INTO tuser (firstname, lastname, email) VALUES (?, ?, ?)
